verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The splendor of the King
has conquered darkness,
the darkness of the world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord be with you,
and also with you
lift up your hearts,
we lift them up to the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us give thanks to the Lord
Our God
It is right to give him thanks and praise.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
This is the night in which Christ
has destroyed death, and from the
dead He rises victorious.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oh happy fault which deserved
so great a Savior. Oh happy fault.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
This is the night in which Christ
has destroyed death, and from the
dead He rises victorious.
